title: pArvatI ninu
sahitya:
pArvati ninu nE nera nammiti shuks pANI brOvu parAkikanEla sushIlE


anupallavi

  gIrvANa vandita pada sArasa sangItalOlE suguNajAlE jAlamEla kAmAkSI


caraNam 1    bhaNDa daitya khaNDanA khaNDala vinutA mArtANDa kOTi tEja nIrajAkSI nikhila sAkSi
    caraNam 2    indu vadanA kunda radanA sindhura gamanA makaranda vANI nIlamEgha vENI gIrvANI
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdarI shivashankarI gaurI guNadhAma kAma pITha vAsini sAmbhavI mrDAnI
